events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately the product has a large scratch on the screen and does not work properly.
The reported issue has been classified under product defect due to the customer's description of scratches and faulty operation.
Case assigned to agent Lisa M., a specialist in product defects and returns, for further handling.
Hello! I’m Lisa from support. I’m sorry to hear about your damaged product. I’m here to help get this sorted out as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and any visible damage so we can assess the issue and proceed with a replacement or refund?
Thank you for responding. I have attached several pictures showing the scratch and the screen flickering when I turn it on.
Thanks for the photos. We will send a replacement immediately. Please return the defective item using the prepaid label we will email you shortly.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the replacement soon.
The replacement process has been initiated and you will receive all return instructions via email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the replacement product and that everything is working properly now.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it works perfectly. Thanks again for the excellent support.
We are glad to hear that the issue is resolved. Closing the case now. Feel free to reach out anytime if you need help.
